original_text: All these people are descendants of Noah's sons, and their children. They went to live in different parts of the earth and their children became different nations. This happened after God covered the earth with water and then the water went away.
korean_text: 이들은 그 백성들의 족보에 따르면 노아 자손의 족속들이요 홍수 후에 이들에게서 그 땅의 백성들이 나뉘었더라

sentences.original_text: All these people are descendants of Noah's sons
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들은 노아의 아들들 후손입니다

sentences.original_text: They went to live in different parts of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅의 다른 부분들에 살러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and their children became different nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 자녀들은 다른 민족들이 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: This happened after God covered the earth with water
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 하나님이 물로 땅을 덮으신 후에 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: and then the water went away
